rules: Rule1: Show1 is extended, or either show1 is rescheduled, show1 is cancelled, or given that organization1 books show1, show1 is not disrupted.
Rule2: Whenever organization1 prepares food1, vehicle1 is not late.
Rule3: If organization1 has a chef, person2, then organization1 has an assistant, person3.
Rule4: Either organization1 has a chef, person2, or organization1 has a kitchen in vehicle1.
Rule5: Given that organization1 has a kitchen in vehicle1, organization1 prepares food1.
Rule6: Assuming organization1 has an assistant, person3, organization1 prepares food1.
Rule7: Organization1 has a manager, person4, or organization1 has a driver, person5.
Rule8: Under the condition that organization1 has a driver, person5, organization1 prepares food1.
Rule9: If it is not true that whenever person1 organizes show1, then, given vehicle1 is not on time, vehicle1 delivers food1, then vehicle1 is late.
Rule10: Provided that it is not the case that if organization1 has a manager, person4, then organization1 prepares food1, show1 is disrupted.
facts: Fact3: It is not the case that vehicle1 delivers food1.
